department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: This is a request for proposal for boiler checks and maintenance services located in Montreal, Quebec
description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number EFA66-220999 dated December 12, 2022 with a closing of February 3rd at 2 PM EST. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.
